install.name: Content - JPlayer
install.author: MaxSVK
install.description: Thank you for installing JPlayer for Joomla!

param.name: videofolder
param.label: Video Folder
param.description: Folder where you store all the video files. File types: .flv, .mp4

param.name: audiofolder
param.label: Audio Folder
param.description: Folder where you store all the audio files. File types: .mp3

param.name: youtuberelated
param.label: Related videos
param.description: Include related videos

param.name: youtubeborder
param.label: Border
param.description: Show border.

param.name: youtubecolors
param.label: Colors
param.description: Colors of Youtube player. For details visit Youtube site.

param.name: youtuberesolution
param.label: Resolution
param.description: Resolution of Youtube player.

param.name: playlistfolder
param.label: Playlist Folder
param.description: Folder where you store all the playlists. File types: .xml

param.name: playlistsize
param.label: Playlist size
param.description: Height of the playlist.

param.name: shuffle
param.label: Shuffle
param.description: Shuffle playback of playlist items

param.name: playerversion
param.label: Player version
param.description: Version of flash player JW Player. Default plugin use version 4.7.811. You can use older version 4.3.132 without JW Player logo at start playing but some functions perhaps not work correctly.

param.name: background
param.label: Background color
param.description: Sets the SWF background color using a hexadecimal value

param.name: backcolor
param.label: Player backcolor
param.description: Background color of the controlbar and playlist in hexadecimal value

param.name: frontcolor
param.label: Player frontcolor
param.description: Color of all icons and texts in the controlbar and playlist in hexadecimal value

param.name: lightcolor
param.label: Player lightcolor
param.description: Color of an icon or text when you rollover it with the mouse in hexadecimal value

param.name: screencolor
param.label: Player screencolor
param.description: Background color of the display in hexadecimal value

param.name: fullscreen
param.label: Fullscreen
param.description: Allow fullscreen in video.

param.name: autoplay
param.label: Autoplay
param.description: Audio/video autoplay when the page loads.

param.name: repeat
param.label: Repeat
param.description: Set always to continously play the song/video/playlist or single to continue repeating the selected file in a playlist.

param.name: downloadLink
param.label: Display download link
param.description: Show link to direct download media (for playlists and remote media is set 'no' )

param.name: skin
param.label: Skin
param.description: Skin located in directory plugins/content/jplayer/skins/ (example 'nacht.swf').

param.name: logo
param.label: Logo
param.description: Logo of your web site (example 'images/jplayer/logo.png').

param.name: jplayerLink
param.label: Display JPlayer link
param.description: Show link to JPlayer homesite

param.name: debugMode
param.label: Debug mode
param.description: Enable this option to display possible errors or other warnings. Useful for debugging.
